channel.title: I got it set to admin with yellow crown. i cant do ::npc outside of mod room?
channel.description: why cant i do ::npc outside of mod room with admin status?

item.title: I got it set to admin with yellow crown. i cant do ::npc outside of mod room?
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

it should be something like

if(player.getLocation().inModRoom()) {
        System.out.println("you can not use this command in the mod room");
}

and it needs to be this if you want admins to only be able to use it outside

if(player.getLocation().inModRoom() && !player.isAdmin()) {
        System.out.println("you can not use this command in the mod room");
}

Edit:

LOL i failed so hard. i was thinking about something else 

if(!player.getLocation().inModRoom() && !player.isAdmin()) {
        System.out.println("you can not use this command outside of the mod room");
}

Read full topic
item.source: I got it set to admin with yellow crown. i cant do ::npc outside of mod room?

item.title: I got it set to admin with yellow crown. i cant do ::npc outside of mod room?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

adu, i was going to say that but since you said it first Ill tell him.

Look at commandhandler.java and look for the “ifplayerismod” and “playerlocation” remove that from your npc command
